title: Blended Learning Information System Design: Practical Application Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational system design experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Implementation of a blended learning model for designing language domain education systems targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: The language blended learning system design process can be explained using the five stages of the ADDIE model.
During the analysis phase, a system design plan can be established considering learner needs and technological environments.
In the development phase, a prototype of language learning content that integrates with digital devices can be created.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
